divs: Sighting Detailswhen i was 5 i would all ways have a dreem wher i would wake up and it was like a big rope was around my chest but nothing was ther.no one was around ether but i was pulled thew the hall way. my moms dore was closed and it would never be closed at night. i would go thew the living room and thew the sliding glass dore to the back yard .once i would get right under this light i would look up that would be it.just last year i was sleeping with my husband i woke up looked stright ahead it was looking at me i froze up every part of my body was tence.i finly got up the courge to quikly lay back down and through the covers over my head. i slowly looked back up and it was gone. i stared to panic i woke my husband up and told him i think i herd a noise in the office. he looked around thir was nothing. i didnt go back to sleep that night. later that morning after my husband whent to work i tried to find something in the living room that would have made me see that.nothing,nothing at all.thir was a light on in the living room that night.i rember its little sholer thir wasnt anny change of color from the lamp it was a dull color like a matt finish.i think my husband think i am crazy
Summary: one was in my living room
